title: MIT Graduate Student Sought As Person Of Interest In Murder Of Yale Student | TODAY
author: TODAY
comment: Imagine graduating from MIT than ruining your entire future by murdering someone
We're all gonna be seeing this clip on a Netflix Doc in 6 years.
Ohh fiancee is MIT graduate, shooter is an MIT graduate. Um ... this sounds like a love triangle gone wrong.
I feel so bad for his family and friends, a life lost at such a young age
I’ve watched too much criminal minds to not know how to solve this. That MIT connection. “García, look to see if the fiancé and the ‘person of interest’ have had any classes together”
description:
A manhunt is underway for a person of interest from MIT as police investigate the shooting murder of a Yale student over the weekend. NBC’s Gabe Gutierrez reports for TODAY.
» Watch TODAY All Day: http://www.youtube.com/today
